divs: sighting detailswhile waiting for the port jefferson ferry in bridgeport ct, i opened the sunroof of our car to entertain my daughter. i pointed out a seagull to her and noticed a silver sphere shaped object moving steadily across the sky at a high rate of speed and at a high altitude. i pointed it out to my wife and she observed the object as well. i could see it clearly for 15 seconds, my wife maybe 10. i have been tested at 20\15 vision and i had no obstruction of view. i believe we were facing east and the object was moving from north to south. we both agreed it wasnt an airplane or helicopter and definetly not a baloon. the object instantly vanished from sight, not out of view. my wife is a skeptic but later admitted to it being a possible ufo.
